channel.title: ASM on Random thoughts about applied cryptography and fuzzing
channel.description: Recent content in ASM on Random thoughts about applied cryptography and fuzzing

item.title: CTFZone 2022 Buggy ASM challenge writeup
item.description: I explore how a field implementation bug in assembly can be exploited to leak the private key in in ECDH (elliptic curve Diffie-Hellman) in a very CTF situation
